gto.ae.quests.0BC456B4331C09F5.descripti: Support &l&eComplete isolation between Patterns&r&r, no more worries about mixing up recipes!
With special optimizations, recipe processing performance is better than normal hatches:

- Optimized distribution mechanism that automatically doubles internal patterns based on distribution quantity, enabling one-time complete distribution and significantly reducing performance consumption.
- Optimized recipe processing mechanism using native types, eliminating secondary conversions.
- Cache the recipe corresponding to the pattern and directly call this recipe next time instead of searching again.
Additionally, the Pattern Buffer retains all internal patterns when broken, no need to use &eEncapsulation Tape&r anymore!

Each &6Assembly Matrix Synthesis Core&r can simultaneously execute &28&r &6synthesis tasks&r, approximately equivalent to &216&r &6Molecular Assembler&r or &21&r &6Expanded Molecular Assembler&r.

&6Assembly Matrix Frame&r: Used to construct each edge of the Assembly Matrix, defining its size. The default outer diameter is 7×7×7.

&6Assembly Matrix Sample Core&r: &cAt least 1 core must be installed&r to provide sample capacity for the Assembly Matrix, each core can hold 36 sample patterns.
&6Assembly Matrix Synthesis Core&r: &cAt least 1 core must be installed&r to allow the Assembly Matrix to perform synthesis, each core can simultaneously execute 8 synthesis tasks.

gto.apotheosis.quests.26ADEFA5357DD47A.d: In the world of Apotheosis, the vanilla bookshelf is merely a mundane &2starting point&r, capping enchantment power at the peak of &4​​15 levels&r​​. But this is not the end—it is the &2beginning&r​​ of your journey.

gto.apotheosis.quests.5F2F02D45B520615.d: &6Tome of Scrapping&r is a method to obtain enchantments from items.
Combine it with another item in an anvil to void the item and &4randomly&r create an enchanted book with some enchantments.
gto.apotheosis.quests.60A41C1F285F31EB.d: Attention! Your world will occasionally spawn glowing, enhanced monsters—
These formidable foes will randomly replace normal monsters and appear.
gto.apotheosis.quests.64D800CE0962D4A3.d: Normally, it is &4impossible to obtain&r spawn eggs, but we can make monsters drop corresponding &2spawn eggs&r by enchanting weapons with the "Capture" enchantment.
This spawn egg's true purpose is &4​​modifying spawners&r​​.
——Right-click the spawner to inject new life into it, causing it to spawn the corresponding monster.
gto.apotheosis.quests.6B1AEF55BB23CA53.d: &dGem Cutting Table&r is used to upgrade &9Gems&r. Upgrading gems consumes &aGem Dust&r.
&aTreasure Material&r and a gem of the same rarity as the second one
gto.apotheosis.quests.6B1AEF55BB23CA53.s: Refine the rare, purify and sublimate.
gto.apotheosis.quests.6B4E1CD13BB19BE5.d: To inlay gems, you need to use the vanilla &5Smithing Table&r
gto.apotheosis.quests.6CF962B9A66C0BFA.d: Spider Web can be combined with an item in an Anvil to remove &4all&r enchantments.
Prismatic Cobweb can remove all &4of the Burning Hells&r enchantments.
gto.apotheosis.quests.75AFFF430F0A340A.d: Each Boss carries a unique &5Affix Equipment&r as loot.
These equipment are not only proof of defeating the Boss, but also a symbol of their identity in life.
——If you do not wish to keep it, you can place it on the Salvaging Table to decompose and convert it into treasure materials.
gto.apotheosis.quests.7E685D749D739401.d: Used to provide fuel for the &5Augmenting Table&r
gto.apotheosis.title: Apotheosis
gto.arsbotania.quests.02835A9B717F47AC.d: Perhaps you should... make a backup?
The Area Breaker does not cause explosions but clears blocks, making it a useful tool for leveling terrain.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0331107259F7B68C.d: After defeating &9&aGaia's Guardian&f&r, you will obtain &e&aGaia Soul&f&r as loot.
The game difficulty and the number of participants in the ritual will together affect the amount of loot.
gto.arsbotania.quests.03C475ABEFF04DEF.d: This prism will redirect any &aMana Burst&f or entity it collides with towards the block or entity emitting the pulse.
gto.arsbotania.quests.041B3B6736C62F82.d: GTO Group harnessed the energy of Gaia to develop time-jumping technology, all condensed into this small bottle.

The Time Twister can rapidly accelerate the processing of machines, but you need to ensure the power grid is sufficient. You wouldn't want to see the machines completely shut down due to a power outage, would you?
gto.arsbotania.quests.041B3B6736C62F82.s: A time machine more high-tech than a bed
gto.arsbotania.quests.04CE14D92603FC7A.d: To continue your journey, you need to obtain &6&aGaia Soul&f&r. This requires performing the &9&aGaia Ritual&f&r.

You need to place 4 &aGaia Crystals&f around an &aactivated beacon&r and prepare a Terrasteel Ingot. After constructing the structure, &aright-click&r the beacon with the ingot while sneaking, preparing for a life-or-death battle.
gto.arsbotania.quests.04D9F6587EF8D9B7.d: &9&aPotion Flask&f&r can store up to 100 potions. Use an empty bottle or potion flask to retrieve them.
Pixies will use these containers for automatic potion crafting.
gto.arsbotania.quests.05FC584B28D957EB.d: Obtain 4 &6Gaia Spirits&r by defeating Gaia to unlock the Gaia cycle.
gto.arsbotania.quests.088FCB5267CB7A89.d: This belt grants random short-term buff potion effects, with variable intensity.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0A1ABE9CF7740AAA.d: &aMana Saving Ring&f slightly increases mana capacity and recovery speed, while reducing the total cost of spellcasting.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0A202D5836DC88AC.d: 魔力花园能够提供大量的魔力
gto.arsbotania.quests.0B61448F01656C1D.d: &9Runes&r are important components in many high-level synthesis recipes in &dFloral Magic&f, and must be crafted on an &aRune Altar&f.

When using the Rune Altar, first place the materials for the desired rune on it. This can be done by &aright-clicking&r or throwing the items directly. The altar also requires a mana supply, so make sure it's connected to an &aMana Burst&f.
After placing the materials, hover over the altar with a wand to view the synthesis progress. Once complete, throw a Living Rock into the altar and retrieve the rune with the wand.

Note: In &aRune Altar&f recipes, the parts of the rune used as catalysts are not consumed. Similar to the &aFloral Pedestal&f, you can automatically fill the last recipe's required items by &aright-clicking&r the altar with an empty hand after the recipe is completed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0C557A9494F58400.d: Causes &aMana Burst&f to generate decorative flames when it hits a block. This flame only provides light and can be extinguished by other &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0D330FAD6C993DBC.d: This is the advanced upgrade version of the spell book!
It increases the total mana value and mana recovery speed and allows you to create and use second-level runes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0D9354ABA2AE2A11.d: &2Incense&f can be infused with potion brews in the &aFloral Brewing&f stand. Place it on a &9Incense Plate&f and light it with flint and steel to release the effects within a 30-block radius centered on the plate, lasting sixty times longer than liquid potion brews.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0E2AD156E5EF263A.d: Requires an &aInscription Table&f for spell inscription
gto.arsbotania.quests.0E7E559F2750F7D3.d: When using this component on a Mana Diffuser, it will only fire when the &aMana Burst&f can hit a creature or player.
gto.arsbotania.quests.0F9DABC15ED589CB.d: This miscellaneous flower is used to detect whether your &aMana Pool&f is in profit or deficit.
Place a &dMana Indicator Flower&r next to the Mana Pool and observe the color change: red glow indicates a deficit, while blue glow indicates a surplus!
gto.arsbotania.quests.111649D7E16D869F.d: &9Spellcaster Wand&r can only inscribe a single spell and must be inscribed through an &aInscription Table&f.
The wand spell must start with Projectile > Accelerate and must be inscribed without any other release methods (such as touch, self, etc.).
This method can break the 10-spell limit. If you want to use Destruction, simply inscribe the Destruction spell alone.
gto.arsbotania.quests.12BEB76EB924379C.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to ignite blocks, but is ineffective on creatures.
gto.arsbotania.quests.13D401048A926A74.d: The Magic Line combines the &aFloral Magic&r and &eNew Magic&r mods
gto.arsbotania.quests.14DB8A515CA50932.d: &9&aWitch's Sword&f&r allows the attachment of touch-based spells.
The last effect of all spells on the sword will receive a level 1 amplification enhancement.
When inscribing spells with the &aInscription Table&f, do not use shape runes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.14EB725643E9F8FE.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to push blocks like a piston.
gto.arsbotania.quests.151648179684B088.d: &aRune Chalk&f is used to draw permanent runes on the ground. These runes will cast spells on creatures that pass over them.
To attach a spell to a rune, you need to inscribe the spell onto &e&aSpell Parchment&f&r using an &aInscription Table&f.
Note: &aRunes&r require a source of energy to drive them.
gto.arsbotania.quests.177658CA70DB0C89.d: &cFiery Lotus&r absorbs nearby combustible items/blocks (one by one) and generates &bMana&r by burning these materials.
gto.arsbotania.quests.17D7D34F519F7E5F.d: To make the final-stage spell book, you need to defeat the &e&aWild Chimaera&f&r.
This is a &aRitual&f that must be completed at the &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.182EBB06B81BDF98.d: Significantly reduces the total mana carried by the &aMana Burst&f, while greatly increasing the pulse speed and range.
gto.arsbotania.quests.18A2FBE2D4133FA2.d: &aArcane Pedestal&f is a necessary component for constructing the &aRitual Brazier&f and using the &aEnchantment Apparatus&f to synthesize items.
It is recommended to make 8 spares.
gto.arsbotania.quests.18E4BD0C2EDCBDF2.s: Condensed with Gaia's heart and soul
gto.arsbotania.quests.19D02325579F2AA8.d: &aVolcanic Mana Channel&f generates source energy by consuming combustible materials. &aSupreme Wood&f can produce additional source energy.
During combustion, surrounding stones are transformed into lava.
gto.arsbotania.quests.1C48F2612F2FA828.d: &2&aMana Burst&f&r directs the flow of mana by emitting &aMana Burst&f.
Use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to bind the emitter to a block to set the pulse direction. While holding the wand, you can also view the status of the mana buffer and &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.1D86B2E553503E53.d: &aDominion Wand&f is used to control creatures encountered in the world! Each type of creature reacts differently to the wand, so be sure to check the old notes!
gto.arsbotania.quests.1DCFC67A8E3DCA2C.d: Similar to the &aAlchemical Catalyst&f, the &9&aSmelting Catalyst&f&r, when placed under the &aMana Pool&f, unlocks cyclic transformation recipes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.205BBDFBCA582E3B.d: &2&aForest Wand&f&r is an essential tool for &dFloral Magic&f.
The wand has &aBinding&r and &9Function&r dual modes:
&aBinding mode&f&r is used to connect Floral Magic devices, sneak-&aright-click&r the first block/flower, then sneak-&aright-click&r the target to establish a connection.
&9Function mode&f&r can rotate blocks like a wrench.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2162EA0216E27D68.d: Throw it into the pool to charge/discharge mana, use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to switch modes by sneaking-&aright-clicking&r.
Note: The tablet does not disappear.
gto.arsbotania.quests.227DBA8836021B0B.d: Initially, you need an &aSource Jar&f to collect Source.
gto.arsbotania.quests.23A2865FBE7831AB.d: Terrasteel crafting requires a massive amount of Mana and must use the &9Spark&r system. Place several Sparks above an &aMana Pool&f, then position a Spark above an Agglomeration Plate to guide the Mana.
After the platform is ready, input the items into the condensation plate to start crafting.
gto.arsbotania.quests.23ADD20D9B1AE0F3.d: Use &b&aWhite Tulpel&f&r to transform stones into Living Rock!
gto.arsbotania.quests.263A1421C0F789E9.d: Hope you have a Happy time.
gto.arsbotania.quests.26B836339560E939.d: Killing Piglin Brutes can obtain Netherite Ingots
gto.arsbotania.quests.271653DEE9363B28.d: Use &b&aWhite Tulpel&f&r to transform dirt into Living Dirt!
gto.arsbotania.quests.27CD17C4B3613171.d: Combine 4 &aGaia&f with Terrasteel Ingots to activate Gaia's Magic Ritual :)
Gaia 2.0 will be more challenging than 1.0, but it will also bring richer rewards.
gto.arsbotania.quests.295C77EEC89000FC.s: Generate Source through creature death and animal breeding
gto.arsbotania.quests.2AB5A33EC30AEA86.d: The probability mechanism of the brewing cauldron is an intricate function, but you only need a few sustained recipe operations to obtain the solvent.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2CBBE8EF07B1D3DA.d: &b&aMana Distributor&f&r can split the input mana pulse to multiple &aMana Pools&f.
&dSparks&r are crucial for advanced &dFloral Magic&f as they direct the transmission of mana.
Place sparks on the &aMana Pool&f and the receiving block to "wirelessly transmit" mana.
Use the &2&aForest Wand&f&r to remove sparks by sneaking-&aright-clicking&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2D0CF18C8B2ABB7D.d: Placed near growing plants or saplings, it generates Source. Supreme Wood provides additional Source!
Note: Bone meal does not generate Source.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2D1533268C835672.d: At the cost of reducing the initial capacity and accelerating mana loss, it greatly increases the movement speed of the &aMana Burst&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.2F01BF021E1BE0A2.d: Combining the &aMana Ring&f with a Terrasteel Ingot upgrades it to the &dAdvanced Mana Ring&f&r, increasing the mana storage capacity by 4 times.
gto.arsbotania.quests.30F7B68093D76590.d: In the &aFloral Brewing&f stand, use potion bottles, mana, and reagents to brew &9Magic Brew&r, which has similar effects to potions.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3182E8AF755104E4.d: When blocking damage, the &9&aWitch's Shield&f&r grants the user short-term &aMana Regeneration&f and &aSpell Damage Boost&f.
Additionally, the shield continuously consumes the wearer's mana for self-repair.
gto.arsbotania.quests.32DF4BC46620F952.d: Placing the &d&aAlchemical Catalyst&f&r under the &b&aMana Pool&f&r unlocks &9Alchemy&r, allowing for item transformation (such as rotting flesh into leather).
gto.arsbotania.quests.33682F4B44950123.d: For magic, we need special magical wood!
gto.arsbotania.quests.371E5E1E435E41AA.d: To use the productive flowers of &dFloral Magic&f, you need &aMysterious Flowers&f.
To obtain &aMysterious Flowers&f, you need to make &aFloral Fertilizer&f, apply it to grass blocks to grow &aMysterious Flowers&f, and apply it to stones to grow &aMysterious Mushrooms&f.
It is recommended to make it directly in the &eInfusion Chamber&r.
When you have obtained all the &aMysterious Flowers&r, you can use the &eEnchantment Apparatus&r for mass production. You will need super super super many &aMysterious Flowers&r later.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3722E5A8BE99C5B1.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to consume its own mana to pierce through obstacle blocks.
gto.arsbotania.quests.379AC75F99212089.d: &9&aMana Ring&f&r is a wearable &aMana Tablet&f, which can be equipped and used like an accessory.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3A20210242A1C865.d: Although you cannot enter the &dElf Portal&r, you can perform &2Elf Trading&f by throwing specific items into the portal. Each trade consumes mana!
The obtained materials can be used to upgrade equipment, such as making a &2Elf Mana Burst&f.
Throwing the &aFloral Magic Codex&f into the portal upgrades it to a version with &eElfology&f, gaining more advanced knowledge of &dFloral Magic&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3A20210242A1C865.s: Do not feed bread into it!
gto.arsbotania.quests.3B2C198F26EC923F.d: Combine Dragonstone, &aElf Dust&f, and &aSource Steel Ingot&, and consume 1.5 pool of mana to obtain Elf Steel!
Obtaining the &aForging Template&f requires using &aSource Steel Sword&f or other plant magic weapons to kill witches or summoners.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3CD45533D0BDF26D.d: When the &aMana Burst&f from this lens hits a block, it makes the block fall like gravel.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D4D88B8BE881351.d: If you want to cast more powerful spells, you need to unlock new runes for the spell book through the &e&aInscription Table&f&r.
Runes are divided into three levels, and unlocking each level requires experience points and specific materials.

The &aInscription Table&f can also be used to inscribe spells onto &aSpell Parchment&f. To do this, place the parchment on the table, hold the spell book, and sneak-right-click the table to select the spell.

When making runes, hold the book and right-click the &aInscription Table&f, search for the target rune, and click the bottom selection button. Right-click the required materials to throw them in and synthesize the rune, then learn it by using the rune.
Note: The workbench can automatically extract materials from nearby containers.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D6CC306F06FEF34.d: If you really can't find ore veins, you can use heteromorphic flowers and living rock to transform
gto.arsbotania.quests.3D862A3D3F83CA26.d: &9&aEnchantment Apparatus&f&r is used to make various items in the mod, requiring source energy to operate.
This device is a multi-block structure and must be synthesized with the &aArcane Pedestal&f.
First, place the &aArcane Core&f on the ground, then place the &aEnchantment Apparatus&f on top of it. Finally, surround the device with &aArcane Pedestals&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.3FD702B5AB006402.d: Have you ever thought about floating and moving anywhere?
This belt grants you the ability to levitate. Activation method: Sneak in mid-air (falling or jumping).
gto.arsbotania.quests.40BC67BDEE15D1DE.d: To make &aSource Crystal&f, place &aCatseye&r or &aOlivine&f into the &aInfusion Chamber&f and transform it!
gto.arsbotania.quests.4167ADF91EF95341.d: &o&3格雷科技有限公司&r&o的&6神秘学家们&r&o在&b魔法&r&o发展到极高水平后研究出的跨界魔法成果。只要给机器提供足够的魔力，机器就无需担忧超频带来的能源损耗。
魔力增幅仓内的UI可调整其缓存大小。开启批处理时，仍然只需要输入一份机器最大功率的魔力即可完成批处理。
gto.arsbotania.quests.41A0BE357C8A74E1.d: &9&aAlchemical Source Channel&f&r can extract source energy from adjacent potion flasks.
The extraction amount varies depending on the potion type and alchemy complexity.
gto.arsbotania.quests.441C0659ED28D935.d: Making a first-level rune requires 3 levels of experience.
gto.arsbotania.quests.457DE8C154641437.d: &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r is used for performing rituals and can also be used as decoration. To light the brazier, use a bright spell on it.
Performing a ritual also requires an &aArcane Pedestal&f. Since there are many types of rituals, please refer to the &eOld Notes&r for each one!
Hold the codex and press Ctrl on the &aRitual Stand&f to operate.
gto.arsbotania.quests.478352E24CE1F45F.d: Makes the &aMana Burst&f emit holiday fireworks when it hits a block.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4C22BA5824662C7E.d: Combine &4Redstone&r with &2&aMana Burst&f&r to make &9&aRedstone Mana Burst&f&r.
This device can be controlled by redstone signals and will only emit mana bursts when receiving a redstone pulse.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4CC46A4E71320140.d: Please refer to the &a&aCodex&f &dFloral Magic&f&r to understand how to use this prism.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4CED346215DDBAC0.d: Significantly extends the duration before the &aMana Burst&f starts to lose mana, but also reduces the pulse movement speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E02DC8A474A4A2F.d: &a&aWhite Tulpel&f&r is one of the first magical flowers you make!
This flower can transform &2logs&r or &9stones&r within an 8-block radius around it into &2Living Wood&r or &9Living Rock&r, respectively, in a 1-block radius area centered on the flower.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E03AC9D56202353.d: Combine &2&aElven Mana Spreaders&f&r with the power of Draconium and &e&aGaia&f&r to craft the ultimate &aGaia Mana Spreader&f
gto.arsbotania.quests.4E9804ED6DE64BDF.d: Aether Vapor You will use a lot of it.
gto.arsbotania.quests.4ECFB1256BD6A7AA.d: &9&aMultimedia Hopper&f&r is a simplified version of the item indexing system, which can request items from the network via redstone signals.

When configuring the requested items, place the corresponding items in the item display frame on the block. If there are multiple display frames, the hopper will randomly select one. Rotate the items in the display frame to adjust the request quantity.
For more detailed information, please refer to the &a&aCodex&f &dFloral Magic&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.504ADBD7E2476827.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to produce a rebound effect when it contacts the surface of a block.
gto.arsbotania.quests.50A2D68A83A50F47.d: Summon an enhanced &5&aGaia's Guardian&f&r with a Gaia Ingot to obtain more &e&aGaia Soul&f&r, and the guardian has a chance to drop &e&aFate Dice&f&r.
gto.arsbotania.quests.51162B9185A45BB1.d: This bow can have spells inscribed through the &aInscription Table&f.
Consumes mana to transform arrows into &aSpell Arrows&f, which trigger the inscribed spell upon hitting a target.
If there are no arrows, it will fire a zero-damage spell arrow; if mana is insufficient, it will fire a normal arrow.
&9&aWitch's Bow&f&r can also use special enhancement arrows to increase spell power.
gto.arsbotania.quests.533624CA5C2A7BBD.d: Allows the &aMana Burst&f to consume its own mana to deal damage to the hit creature.
gto.arsbotania.quests.542C6D76B579886C.d: When the Magic Flower completes its growth cycle, its petals can be used to make magic fibers.
These fibers are used to synthesize various items, including your first set of magic armor!
gto.arsbotania.quests.5732936F1FD1D4AE.d: Makes the &aMana Burst&f affect dropped items, experience orbs, and falling blocks within its range, making their movement trajectory completely synchronized with the pulse.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5766C8B9E850C186.d: To make the synthesis material for the Arcane Core, the &9&aSource Crystal&f&r, we 'need to first build the &6&aInfusion Chamber&f&r.
&aInfusion Chamber&f requires source energy to infuse items. It itself generates a small amount of source energy and can also use &aSource Jar&f as an energy source.
Some recipes also require &aArcane Pedestals&f to be arranged around it.
gto.arsbotania.quests.58EC47584C773B82.d: Using the &aEnchantment Device&f structure, we will make our first seed——&5&aMana Flower Seed&f.
Used for cultivating magical fabric materials!
gto.arsbotania.quests.597E4D997A20736D.d: Use &b&aWhite Daisies&f to transform High Wood into Living Wood!
gto.arsbotania.quests.5A7FF6D0AED656DC.d: Shorten the startup time for &aMana Pulse&f to start consuming mana, but simultaneously reduce the rate of consumption.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5CB5F4CD521F6361.d: With the help of elemental materials, you can upgrade sparks using the &dEnhancement Core&r. Right-click the spark with the Enhancement Core in hand to upgrade. Sneaking and right-clicking the spark will &aremove&f the enhancement effect.
Dispersion Enhancement: Makes the spark draw mana from its tank to charge the mana containers of nearby players.
Dominion Enhancement: Forces absorption of mana from non-enhanced sparks' tanks.
Invisibility Enhancement: Distributes the stored mana to nearby non-enhanced or dispersion-type sparks.
Isolation Enhancement: Prevents the spark from interacting with Dominion/Invisibility-enhanced sparks.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5CFBA24B3E0CDEDD.d: Hold a spellbook and press C to open the spell creation interface.
Each spell must include a casting form. Initially, you have three basic forms: projectile, self-cast, and contact.
The effects section determines how the spell functions; a single spell can have up to 9 effects.
Beginner phase can use damage and destruction effects.
Choose the form and effects combination, name it to create a new spell.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5D60FFFB4D2F55F3.d: Used to record a warp point for permanent teleportation, which can be used for cross-dimensional teleportation (you can also use other methods).
gto.arsbotania.quests.5E2AA5695D1F21D7.d: &0&aBlack Lotus&f only exists in chests and can be infused with condensed mana by pouring it into a &aMana Pool&f.
gto.arsbotania.quests.5EF08646D8F4C432.d: Make &aMana Pulse&f capable of penetrating blocks, but it will shorten the pulse's lifespan.
gto.arsbotania.quests.60778D26C539B172.d: If you already have a Photovoltaic Power Station, open the UI and place a group of Flower of the Sun, you can use it to obtain Mana easily and quickly!
gto.arsbotania.quests.632BC46928CC9A8C.d: Using the &9&aWitch's Mirror&f, you can trigger your own spell when used.
Spells cast through this mirror consume less mana and have a longer duration.
When engraving, do not use form symbols.
gto.arsbotania.quests.634E71DBAE81D197.d: Through &dPlant Magic&f, you can use &9&aMultimedia Sparks&f to construct a &dMultimedia Network&f above a container.

The network requires at least one &bMain Node&r &9&aMultimedia Spark&f as its core, then can be expanded with any number of &aMultimedia Sparks&f. Sparks of the same color will automatically connect within an 8-block range to form an item network.
Sparks can only recognize the items beneath them and can only access items through the top. All items within the network can be accessed by multimedia components such as Funnels and Indexers.
gto.arsbotania.quests.63DD7F5A4441ACE7.d: To craft a second-tier rune, you need to consume 5 levels of experience.
Also requires the &9Mage's&a Spellbook&f as a synthesis medium.
gto.arsbotania.quests.64D0E66CB4FBEC82.d: To start using it, you need to synthesize a &eNovice Spellbook&r.
This is where you create and store spells.
Pressing the &9C&r key will open the 'Create Spell' page. There are multiple tabs on the left, but the main three are: Spell Creation, &aColor Picker&f, and Enchanter.
This spellbook only allows you to create and use first-tier runes. To create more powerful spells, you need to upgrade the spellbook!
gto.arsbotania.quests.65238A6DCDDDFA0D.d: Arrange 5 blocks of Livingrock and 4 blocks of Lapis in a checkerboard pattern, then place the Condensation Plate on the central Livingrock block to complete the build.
gto.arsbotania.quests.665B4A8FF5277316.d: Make gravity influence the trajectory of &aMana Pulse&f to form a parabolic path, while slightly extending the duration before it starts consuming mana.
gto.arsbotania.quests.66F1609053B5407C.d: Many accessories imbued with the power of &e&aGaia's Soul&f await exploration! Remember to check the details!
All descriptions can be found in the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section.
gto.arsbotania.quests.68DC8A2B4BEF9878.d: Allows &aMana Pulse&f to dye hit dyeable blocks (including connected blocks) and sheep.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A0ED6CCE3C4BDFE.d: Construct a checkerboard base with 5 Glows and place gold blocks in the remaining 4 spaces, then place an Elemental Condenser on the central Glow.
Similar to Terrasteel synthesis, requires &aSparks&f to transfer mana. Sparks need to be equipped with Dominion Enhancement to function as an infuser.
Now you can produce Elemental Steel!
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A1C0B17B22CE50F.d: The &9&aMana Boost Pendant&f increases your maximum mana.
The &e&aMana Regeneration Pendant&f increases your mana regeneration speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6A56574BC562B227.d: When equipped, the &9&aHalo Ring&f continuously generates mana slowly and injects it into mana storage items in your inventory.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6B511C8B572E8940.d: The energy bar at the bottom left of the screen represents your mana pool!
As the mod progresses, you can improve mana capacity or casting efficiency in various ways. Upgrading the spellbook can also enhance mana!
gto.arsbotania.quests.6DAA82B5F94AF9F8.d: The &9&aLuminous Flask&f summons floating light sources around the user.
The &e&aVoid Flask&f destroys picked-up items (filterable) at the cost of mana.
Configure items for destruction: secondary hand-click the flask or place the flask on an &aEngraving Table&f with items.
Needs to be in the hotbar to function.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6F3602F5600A6221.d: To craft a third-tier rune, you need to consume 10 levels of experience.
gto.arsbotania.quests.6FBE0BF8A7ADBB26.d: Upgrade the &2&aMana Launcher&f by installing a &9&aMana Lens&f at the front. The basic lens has no special effects.
Upgrade the lens to give &aMana Pulse&f special effects. Make colored or prismatic lenses using dyes or &aMana Pearls&f.
Combine runes with specific items to make advanced lenses. Use &a&aSlimeball&f to fuse two lenses into a &9Composite Lens&f, stacking enhancements.
gto.arsbotania.quests.705706C604CECF1D.d: This package also includes a wireless Mana network with Infinite storage capacity!
gto.arsbotania.quests.70C25BFA6FFA1799.d: Enhance the &aHalo Ring&f with Terrasteel Ingots to significantly increase the mana generation rate of the ring.
gto.arsbotania.quests.70C5A902C0D26628.d: Place specific items into the &b&aMana Pool&f to infuse &9Mana&f.
Check the synthesis recipe via JEI for mana requirements of each item.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7440E522FC31C341.d: The &9&aMultimedia Crystal&f displays the total amount of a specified item in the spark's network above it. Use it by right-clicking the crystal with the item in hand.
gto.arsbotania.quests.79A19D0B2F94EFDC.d: Make &aMana Pulse&f automatically track nearby mana-accepting blocks, while slightly reducing pulse speed.
gto.arsbotania.quests.79BE48D56622542F.d: Now we have basic flowers, we can use the &9&aAlchemy Apparatus&f to transform ordinary plants into functional mana-producing flowers!
To activate the &aMystical Petal's&f energy, inject &bWater&f into the Alchemy Apparatus first. You can do this by right-clicking with a water bucket or throwing a water bucket directly.
To synthesize, place the items into the Alchemy Apparatus. Right-click to retrieve any placed items.
Tip: After your first synthesis, right-clicking &a&aAir&f within 20 seconds will quickly repeat the last recipe, convenient for batch production!
gto.arsbotania.quests.7A359C1F5E041C4F.d: Now we have made &bLivingstone&r, we can start synthesizing &9&aMana Pool&f.
The &aMana Pool&f is the core facility for storing mana. Once the pool contains enough mana, you can convert specific resources into magical materials by placing items into the mana-infused pool.
To &bgenerate mana&r, you need to craft &2&aMana Spreader&f, such as &cFire Lotus&r.
Hint: &aMana Pool&f can store up to 1,000,000 mana. Holding a &2&aForest Staff&f and observing the pool will show the current mana level.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7A82D66B1B138F0F.d: Double the mana capacity of &aMana Pulse&f, but reduce transmission speed and increase mana loss for long-distance transmission.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7AD4D212633DAEC8.d: Inject entropy into &aMana Pulse&f—essentially, it will explode when hitting objects that cannot receive mana.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7B3FAF5CA4DD217C.d: By using the &aAlchemy Apparatus&f, we can create various flowers that provide assistance during adventures. These flowers are divided into two categories: &9&aFunctional Flowers&f and &a&aMana-producing Flowers&f.

&9&aFunctional Flowers&f are flowers that assist daily tasks. For example, &7Funnel Orchid&r will operate like a funnel, absorbing items within a certain range. Some &aFunctional Flowers&f require &dMana&f to function.

&a&aMana-producing Flowers&f are flowers that generate &dMana&f in different ways. The most commonly used mana-producing flower is &cFire Lotus&r, which generates mana by consuming nearby burnable materials like coal.

In this task chain, tasks with &cSquare&r icons represent &aMana-producing Flowers&f, while &9Circular&r icons represent &aFunctional Flowers&f. You can also check the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section for detailed functions of each flower.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7B95C7407A1F5550.d: This component converts the pulse mode of the &aMana Launcher&f to emit continuous particle streams instead of short pulses. Does not consume mana. Very suitable for decorative purposes.
gto.arsbotania.quests.7DF7F9CD9A795E69.d: The &5&aMultimedia Index&f is an interactive interface to access &9Multimedia Network&f resources, allowing you to call upon network resources built by &aMultimedia Sparks&f.

When used, approach the index to intercept nearby players' &aChat Messages&f. Players can request items by entering commands, for example, &b10 &aIron Ingots&f; if the network has the items, they will be automatically distributed.
More operation guides can be found in the &a&aLexicon&f &dPlant Magic&f section.
gto.arsbotania.title: Magical Line
gto.backpack.quests.013873395CE12A8A.des: Temporarily take some liquids to store
gto.backpack.quests.05811315012BBCBA.des: Can filter which items to take
But the tag mode can set items with tags a bit less
gto.backpack.quests.1CE34BD4900990C6.des: You need to gradually upgrade your backpack
The backpack is convenient for deploying multi-block machines by storing multi-block blocks
gto.backpack.quests.2F2F2AF4E9E493BD.sub: Isn't this thing hot to carry?
gto.backpack.quests.466924A208AC6C02.des: After installing the module, right-click the container to store items in the backpack
gto.backpack.quests.49F7C40FE34E45A2.des: Used for unloading items, such as ores
gto.backpack.quests.6E7EA35EA38FC861.des: Set the filter output to reserve some needed items in the backpack, such as food and hoes
gto.backpack.quests.6E7EA35EA38FC861.sub: Oh no no no, I need this thing
gto.backpack.title: Modern Age
gto.chemical.quests.03E712472BA4DE1C.des: Mainly used for bio, optical circuit synthesis
gto.chemical.quests.042F124C3D95D3A1.des: This chapter is mainly to introduce the details of obtaining and synthesizing chemical materials, and the differences from the original GregTech process
It is recommended to read this after HV as you need a distillation tower
gto.chemical.quests.042F124C3D95D3A1.tit: Encourage People to Study Chemical Materials--XXXX
gto.chemical.quests.052144556E5F0F65.des: &eCan be used as rocket fuel for tier 5 and below
gto.chemical.quests.089B5BE493FBDFF1.des: Necessary material for nanoscale extraction rare earth route
gto.chemical.quests.0C3CADD82454857F.des: Plastic component raw material for &6OPV machine casing&r
gto.chemical.quests.0F723ECBB55301C6.des: Octane can be obtained from light fuel in hydrocracking
One barrel of High Octane can produce 4,800,000 EU, which is 3.4 times that of High Hexadecane, but the production line is also more Intricate!
gto.chemical.quests.0FA40D13A8103C2F.des: By pyrolyzing logs, you can distill byproducts such as charcoal, and then distill further to obtain wood acetate, wood gas, and wood tar for further distillation
The excess charcoal is then subjected to pyrolysis, and the coal tar is distilled.
Other routes can also be used, but this route is more comprehensive.
gto.chemical.quests.0FA40D13A8103C2F.tit: Another Way to Obtain Chemical Materials
gto.chemical.quests.139432EF935D1E99.des: &6UHV和UEV机器外壳&r的塑料部件原料&r
更高阶的塑料，应用范围较广
gto.chemical.quests.14568E9B638FC16A.des: The distilled products of liquidized air &6can provide a large variety of rare gases&r
With this, your blast furnace will no longer lack rare gas supply
gto.chemical.quests.14568E9B638FC16A.tit: The air in the End is so fragrant, why are my eyes purple?
gto.chemical.quests.17AF85D73DDCC646.des: If you need to obtain &6Sulfur Dust&r from petrochemicals, you will need a &6Desulfurizer&r.
gto.chemical.quests.17B2FE7B42729497.des: After completing the wood processing line, this fuel is the rocket fuel you can access at HV
gto.chemical.quests.1A162211142DF255.des: More complex synthesis steps, not recommended for burning electricity, only used for loading rocket fuels
&eCan be used as rocket fuel for tier 3 and below
gto.chemical.quests.1FC9AD563E0C8ED2.des: &6LV and MV machine casing&r plastic component raw material
&rMainly used for chip material synthesis and assembly
gto.chemical.quests.21FE87B6569A7C62.des: Most of the gases collected by the gas collection chamber can be liquefied and further distilled, if there is a liquefaction and distillation route, take it
Early in-game required &6Nitrogen&r and &6Oxygen&r can be collected by air centrifuge
Air is also a regular for internal combustion engines and gas engines, prepare for the fuel god and large benzene cycle fuel god routes
gto.chemical.quests.21FE87B6569A7C62.sub: Finally, we can burn ingots quickly
gto.chemical.quests.21FE87B6569A7C62.tit: Collection and Centrifugation of Rare Gases
gto.chemical.quests.2340BBD03AC6F063.des: Mainly used for laminated glass synthesis.....
gto.chemical.quests.2340BBD03AC6F063.tit: Tell me, Laminated Glass Must Need This?
gto.chemical.quests.25E09D64E6A68294.des: Biochaff obtained by compressing and crushing crops or other plants, thermal distillation after pyrolysis will yield the resulting products, which is also the main source of ethanol
Although the burn trees line can also obtain these products, the product output rates are different
gto.chemical.quests.2638049AB975F7E4.des: Put in &6Dimensional Data&r and &6Vacuum Freezer&r to produce &6Liquid Air&r
gto.chemical.quests.2638049AB975F7E4.tit: Want to Get It All in One Step?
gto.chemical.quests.26EF5FA36E0879C8.des: Congratulations on entering the OpV era by achieving this. Go out and walk around, look at the trees and flowers
gto.chemical.quests.29CD828E68A2852F.des: &6HV and EV machine casing&r plastic component raw material.
Higher-tier plastics with broader application ranges.
gto.chemical.quests.2ABE657CD0D02B1C.des: Mainly used for circuit board synthesis
gto.chemical.quests.2FD6B657F899578B.des: When you are proficient in preparing the materials for polytetrafluoroethylene synthesis, and try to synthesize in a chemreactor, you finally discover that the recipe has changed to a polymer reactor recipe
Simple plastics can be synthesized in a chemreactor in the early stages, but other higher-tier plastics will use a polymer reactor for synthesis, along with other specific chemical materials
Here we will briefly introduce these materials
gto.chemical.quests.2FD6B657F899578B.tit: Why Can't My Plastic Be Synthesized in a Chemreactor?
gto.chemical.quests.3A380B8474CB1EC5.des: Prepare more distillation towers, stainless steel is also needed. Burn more, burn faster!
gto.chemical.quests.3A380B8474CB1EC5.sub: HV Stage —— You Can't Escape It
gto.chemical.quests.45971388CF90B954.des: Preferred material for gas power generation lines, just this stuff is easy to make
Gas has a lower calorific value compared to fuel, but the convenience of obtaining it makes up for this
One bucket of benzene produces 352000EU (high-sixteen is four times this)
gto.chemical.quests.45971388CF90B954.tit: Embrace the Great Benzene Cycle God
gto.chemical.quests.45F1C570886B38C5.des: Mainly used for photoresist film or line
gto.chemical.quests.46A2DD7AE5DD109E.des: Upper-level replacement for mixed fuels, but still not recommended for power generation due to the trouble of synthesizing hydrazine.
&eCan be used as rocket fuel for tier 4 and below
gto.chemical.quests.479EDE838B23AFC7.des: After desulfurization, the products can be used to produce diesel or undergo steam cracking distillation
Steam can be obtained not only by boiler, but also by fluid heater, the latter is the fastest way to obtain steam in high-voltage situations
gto.chemical.quests.479EDE838B23AFC7.tit: Steam Cracking and Distillation, Quite Common
gto.chemical.quests.482F9110F2896CC9.des: One of the core synthesis materials for the Universal Processor
gto.chemical.quests.49C8F520B248B5D6.des: The Large Chemical Reactor can run Small Chemical Reactor recipes, but not the other way around
gto.chemical.quests.4A651F3100EEFC5B.des: The plastic component material for the &6ZPM and UV machine casing&r
An advanced version of polytetrafluoroethylene, like polyethylene, recipes that use it as a material further halve their consumption compared to those using polytetrafluoroethylene
gto.chemical.quests.5095C793089FC8FC.des: Its extremely cold nature makes it very suitable as a frequent inhabitant of the culture dish
Often used in biological circuit synthesis lines
&eCan be used as rocket fuel for stage six and below
gto.chemical.quests.5095C793089FC8FC.tit: Faster cooling ability than a snow bucket
gto.chemical.quests.599B5D0576B52956.des: One of the means to obtain black/white dwarf star material in the late game
&eCan be used as fuel for all rockets
gto.chemical.quests.62FBD1454322B93D.des: Often used in glue synthesis and its upper material synthesis
gto.chemical.quests.684D2B29BED59876.des: The Integrated Sawmill Factory can perfectly consume the entire lifespan of wood, turning it into a glorious member of the Gray Material
gto.chemical.quests.684D2B29BED59876.tit: It's time to say goodbye to long production lines
gto.chemical.quests.69A4E61D83D26E94.des: Bio-diesel or diesel plus nitromethane can produce High Octane 16, nitromethane is easy to obtain its synthesis chemical material through the &cWood Chemical Route&r
One barrel of High Octane 16 can produce 1440000 EU
gto.chemical.quests.69A4E61D83D26E94.tit: High Octane 16, the fuel favored by the Church of Fuel.
gto.chemical.quests.6B04A4D8C5464CFA.des: &6IV and LUV machine casing&r plastic component material
Advanced plastic, on the recipes using polyethylene, can halve the consumption
It is also a main synthesis material for the Large Chemical Reactor
gto.chemical.quests.70FAF5DB5018B0B8.des: Pairing with ethanol from the Wood Chemical Route can produce &6Bio-diesel
Of course, you can also make it into &6High Octane 16 Fuel&r
gto.chemical.quests.720FF5C7DE3537DC.des: If you don't urgently need Nether air centrifuge products, it's recommended to go straight to the liquid distillation, which can also supplement a large amount of chemical materials
gto.chemical.quests.720FF5C7DE3537DC.tit: A sulfuric smell, am I in a sulfur mine?
gto.chemical.quests.747142ADB664038D.des: These two are frequent guests in cable synthesis and also in component assembly lines
gto.chemical.quests.759E3183435B137A.des: RP-1 rocket fuel, which can be easily synthesized after the EV era, and its simple synthesis characteristics after completing the Wood Chemical Route make it a place in fuel generation after EV
One barrel is 2048000 EU, 1.4 times that of High Octane 16
&eCan be used as fuel for stage two and below
gto.chemical.quests.76E516FC62A472EF.des: &6UIV and UXV machine casing&r plastic component material
Higher grade plastic, with a wider range of applications
gto.chemical.quests.76E516FC62A472EF.tit: The last plastic shell you can obtain
gto.chemical.quests.78F8D94DB059ACC4.des: Subsequent integrated processing factories, requiring multiple blocks, prepare the materials before coming
gto.chemical.quests.79513BF6A39FA951.des: Finally, you can throw away that long and complex rocket fuel synthesis
gto.chemical.quests.7BC5C696C89B17E3.des: Four times the amount of RP-1. 8192000 EU
It is also a fuel that can be easily synthesized after completing the Wood Chemical Route
gto.chemical.quests.7BC5C696C89B17E3.tit: Solved the problem of RP-1 being not durable
gto.chemical.quests.7C77C164E8B298A4.des: Simplified chemical processing machine in the late game
Different from the Chemical Distortion Instrument next door, you need to wash it with nanites, it is recommended to prepare a large amount of nanites before running it automatically
The module main block is placed on the tail end of the polytetrafluoroethylene pipe, facing the direction opposite to the main block of the machine
gto.chemical.title: Chemical Engineering
gto.data.title: GregTech: Odyssey
gto.energy-producing.title: Energy
gto.ev.quests.031BBC8B522A562F.descripti: Production of Water will pause when work is suspended.
gto.ev.quests.031BBC8B522A562F.subtitle: Lots and lots of water!
gto.ev.quests.033815C0756BAE1F.descripti: You need to invest all your platinum metal sources: &6Banded Copper Ore, Cassiterite, Brass Ore, Shellite Ore&r
gto.ev.quests.033815C0756BAE1F.title: Soft and Fluffy Platinum Ore
gto.ev.quests.04C8A65088BA2229.descripti: Mars is the planet that needs to be reached by T2 rockets, abbreviated as T2 planet
Obtain large amounts of white tungsten ore from Mars, and start your first production line challenge
gto.ev.quests.0D4645862BFD304D.descripti: Advanced Ceramic Blocks require more precise &6Isostatic Pressing&r, otherwise internal defects will occur due to uneven pressure.
gto.ev.quests.0D4645862BFD304D.subtitle: Absolutely Equal
gto.ev.quests.1CF7845875EEFA3B.descripti: At this stage, you need a large amount of Tungstensteel to craft machines. Ensure you have a steady Tungsten output before starting this phase.
This way, before manufacturing your first IV motor, you can accumulate &6a large amount of base materials of this phase - tungsten steel
gto.ev.quests.1CF7845875EEFA3B.subtitle: &9You need imagination as boundless as the sky
gto.ev.quests.1CF7845875EEFA3B.title: Welcome to the &9High Pressure&r Phase
gto.ev.quests.1D20FEE7860F5575.descripti: What you found on the moon, do you remember?
gto.ev.quests.1F7F326F38204751.descripti: The ultimate solution for photovoltaic power plants
gto.ev.quests.32B3E6812521AB70.descripti: Similar to the Industrial Furnace, the Alloy Smelter is a dedicated multi-block machine for producing &6Molten Alloy
Molten Alloy is similar to the hot ingot produced by the Industrial Furnace, and needs to be cooled by a &6Vacuum Cryopump&r to be further processed

When you later see new alloy ingots, you can directly try to look up their molten form recipes in the Alloy Blast Smelter. It can produce &emultiple ingots&r worth of &emolten Fluid&r at once, generally &emuch faster&r than mixing and then smelting in a High furnace.
From the &enext stage&r onwards, there will be a large number of metals that &conly&r it can produce.
gto.ev.quests.32B3E6812521AB70.subtitle: The "What's-In-The-Fridge" Smelter
gto.ev.quests.38E57C47A1D6D206.descripti: The second single element production challenge in the EV phase, you have finally completed the platinum processing production line!
gto.ev.quests.38E57C47A1D6D206.title: Let me see your results!
gto.ev.quests.3BF80AAF9945B144.descripti: The multi-block version of rocket engines, with much higher efficiency and power generation than single-block machines
gto.ev.quests.3C7AE4505ACE7C80.subtitle: Keep away from kids
gto.ev.quests.3EDC674F36EDC52E.descripti: As chip manufacturing becomes more precise, ordinary distilled water can no longer meet the needs of cutting wafers. So... you have unlocked a new branch of GTO—&bPurified Water&r!
The Water Purification Plant is the core of the entire water purification network. It is used to integrate all water plants into a unified network and provide centralized power supply for them.
gto.ev.quests.45D5AB8BE1006124.descripti: Go to &6Ceres&r to complete this task
gto.ev.quests.479C7C9D5519FC41.descripti: Nothing can stop you from flying towards the stars again
gto.ev.quests.49501F06059BEAFD.descripti: As an all-purpose tool, you can use &6Mallet&r in most places that need tools in your base
If you haven't modified the key settings, press &e[J]&r and &e[Shift]+[J]&r to adjust the Bore Velocity. It's best not to set it too high when debug the production line.
&7&oIf you are playing on a multiplayer server and messed something up, I foresee your friends bringing another Mallet to find you......&r&r
gto.ev.quests.49CD464A77D897E3.descripti: Chemical Vapor Deposition (CVD) is an advanced material preparation technique, which you will need in the future to make large quantities of new materials with various functions
gto.ev.quests.4BCAA414BA1AE5FD.descripti: Checklist: Inductor, Capacitor, also in SMD version.
gto.ev.quests.4BCAA414BA1AE5FD.subtitle: Cheaper EV circuits
gto.ev.quests.4BCAA414BA1AE5FD.title: &bNanoprocessor Assembly
gto.ev.quests.4D36C61E2AF3205F.descripti: The environment on Venus is extremely harsh, with excessively high surface temperatures, &6Space Nano Chestplate&r, which provides the necessary fire resistance and is freely obtained after unlocking HV phase, can help with this
Go to &6Venus&r to complete this task
gto.ev.quests.5612C7735BC4F5BC.descripti: T4 level Coil Blocks, incorporating the results of all your mining and production lines so far
gto.ev.quests.5B12999747D6C776.descripti: It can provide a cleanroom environment for &emultiblock machines&r, but &4does not support&r&6Processing Plants&r.
gto.ev.quests.5B243900BEDF71CA.descripti: Don't forget to equip the &bT2&r organ
gto.ev.quests.5B98FF5DDD4B2629.descripti: Think it's too expensive? Don't worry, you will eventually find a cheaper path
gto.ev.quests.5B98FF5DDD4B2629.subtitle: First LuV circuit
gto.ev.quests.5B98FF5DDD4B2629.title: &bNanoprocessor Mainframe
gto.ev.quests.5FC85281DA794E02.descripti: You need more advanced rubber to make the troublesome &6Conveyor Belt&r and &6Electric Pump&r, and &6IV cables&r starting with the EV era
Give it the attention it deserves, establish a large-scale and continuous production line!
gto.ev.quests.63B3B1533377F7BA.descripti: Checklist: Diodes, also in SMD version
gto.ev.quests.63B3B1533377F7BA.subtitle: Cheaper IV circuits
gto.ev.quests.63B3B1533377F7BA.title: &bNanoprocessor Supercomputer
gto.ev.quests.67E7B62710A78614.descripti: Regardless of whether produced by Explosion Chamber or Electric Arc Furnace, both require &9Zero Gravity&r, this is your second visit to the space station
gto.ev.quests.689199DD0E42A571.descripti: You need to use Purple Gold to make the next stage rocket
gto.ev.quests.6FFA3DE7A0920B7A.descripti: The powerful thrust of the fourth stage rocket unlocks a dwarf planet in the asteroid belt - Ceres
gto.ev.quests.70ECB812598A4BEC.descripti: The first step in water purification processing, just meeting the current cleanliness requirements
gto.ev.quests.7323C9DD52244FA0.descripti: Used to collect large amounts of &6air&r from various dimensions, input into &6Vacuum Cryopump&r to directly collect &6liquid air&r
Distilling certain air can obtain &6very rare gaseous substances&r, you should consider setting up a dedicated production line to continuously produce these substances
gto.ev.quests.789B188B05759151.descripti: Due to its metastable nature, &6Quantum Eye&r needs to be immersed in inert gas &6Radon&r in &dZero Gravity&r
gto.ev.quests.79257FEB76383E7C.descripti: Obtained &6Advanced Circuit Assembler Ⅲ&r? Throw it into your ultra-clean room, &6Nano Circuits&r are about to be produced!
gto.ev.quests.7ABCF4826CC6154B.descripti: &6Tungsten Dust&r is the most important single element in the EV phase, this is your first production challenge
The three extremely useful alloys unlocked immediately after require tungsten
gto.ev.quests.7B5955B52F6F2497.subtitle: Don't forget to replace the Integral Framework in the machine.
gto.ev.quests.7BAEF04EC7896079.descripti: Your strongest single-block power source in the early EV period
gto.ev.quests.7D8D340B336E38F7.descripti: When processing new circuit boards, remember to optimize the previous recipes. Now you can use the cheaper SMD series!
Checklist: Are the resistor, capacitor, and transistor surface-mount versions?
gto.ev.quests.7D8D340B336E38F7.subtitle: Cheaper HV circuits
gto.ev.quests.7D8D340B336E38F7.title: &bNanoprocessor

gto.gregtech_odyssey.quests.3BC9246D8FD4: Perhaps you have never heard of GregTech, or maybe you are a seasoned veteran of the mod. The questbook will guide you step by step through all the milestone stages in an easy-to-understand manner.
This modpack features &2significant changes&r in the progression compared to the original GregTech series, so following the quest book might be a good choice.

&7However, the questline does not guarantee the best process experience. As you progress, you will learn how to design and optimize your own production lines, which is the core fun of the GregTech series.&r
So what should you do first? Make flint tools and find a place near water to set up an early development base.
Press &e[Tab]&r to open the quest book anytime, anywhere. Most quests can only be started after completing the previous one.
&7&o&mAnd there are some hidden easter egg tasks&r
&r&4Do not&r stay up late and overwork, health is the foundation of success!!
&9&oOur journey is to the stars and the sea&r&r

&7&oIf you are currently on the main storyline and find this task impossible to complete, it means you haven't finished the onboarding training! Click the chain icon in the upper left corner of this window to go to the onboarding page.

gto.hv.quests.4329DC25522DE09E.descripti: &6HV Saw, Assembler, and Laser Engraver&r, this is their sweet home
If you are not familiar with the &6Clean Room&r, check out the multiblock structure in EMI, you can also check the next page for instructions

Let's build a 5x5x5 Clean Room first, you can expand it as needed later. Power it up and let it run until the cleanliness reaches 100%. If the cleanliness is below 100%, machines in the Clean Room have a chance to consume items being made, so you need to keep the Clean Room running continuously!

Any maintenance issue will lower the cleanliness cap by 10%. Use Maintenance Prompt Cover with Redstone Lamp to monitor your Clean Room, or use the Automatic Maintenance Chamber to avoid the pain of maintenance.
More advanced chips and circuits need to be made in cleaner environments, which is why we need Clean Rooms
This is an interesting multiblock structure, you can place various single-block machines inside to provide the &eClean Room conditions&r needed for recipes!

Clean Room is a hollow multiblock structure ranging in size from 5x5x5 to 15x15x15. The bottom of the Clean Room does not need to be square, rectangles can also be used. The top layer is made of &6Filter Mechanical Blocks&r, except for the edges, which are &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks. &6Controller&r must be located at the center of the top layer. If the length or width of the Clean Room is even, the controller can be placed on either of the center two blocks (or four blocks). The rest of the structure is built of Plastic Concrete blocks.
&e&nNon-top layer&r blocks can be replaced with any number of blocks:

An &6Iron Door&r allows you to enter and exit the Clean Room. Make sure to keep it closed, otherwise the Clean Room will lose cleanliness rapidly. &6Travel Anchors&r and &6Elevators&r can also be used, and if needed, they can even be &eembedded into the floor&r.

You can use &6Diodes, Item Transport Chambers, Fluid Transport Chambers, or Machine Hulls&r to automatically transport power and materials through walls. However, be very careful when updating your internal machines. You must remove the old machine hulls and cables, then replace them with new ones of a higher voltage, otherwise you will be very disappointed. If it is only for material transportation, then you don't need to worry about the voltage.

If you want to see inside, you can use &6Clean Room Glass&r. If you like, you can even replace all non-top layer &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks with &6Clean Room Glass&r to make it look like a white beach house. The power consumption of this multiblock structure is unusual, starting at 30EU/t then gradually decreasing. But even at 30EU/t, make sure to give it enough power, you usually use MV power. Remember, this only applies to Clean Rooms, not a general rule.

gto.lv.quests.58434872C6EC4E32.descripti: There must be &eno obstructions&r (including pipes) within 3 blocks in front of the Muffler Hatch! Additionally, in the default configuration and on Normal difficulty or higher, the Muffler Hatch has a certain chance per second to produce ash. When the ash is full, it is also considered obstructed, causing the machine to stop working! Its salvage probability is the chance of &6not producing ash&r. The more advanced the Muffler Hatch, the more pollution it can suppress, resulting in less ash production. It also has a larger capacity, ultimately reducing the frequency at which you need to clean the Muffler Hatch.

It should be noted that, in theory, the &eSilencer Hatch&r cannot be cleared of ash&r by any means other than drones. However, aside from upgrading your Silencer Hatch, the &6Air Scrubber&r can also significantly reduce the frequency of cleaning the Silencer Hatch, alleviating some of the hassle...

gto.main-stoneage.quests.06FE84E75DBE704: The Advanced Terminal is extremely powerful; crouch and right-click to view detailed settings, which will be introduced one by one here:
&cMirror Build:&rClick the top right corner to select the level blocks to install, including but not limited to Glass, Heating Coils, casings, etc.
&5Number of repetitions of the structure:&rAffects the number of repeated structure layers in the multiblock, such as the length of the Assembly Line, the height of the Neutron Activator, etc.
eg. If you select a repeating structure of 15 when building the Assembly Line, it will automatically build a 16-slot Assembly Line for crafting recipes.
&eNo Hatch mode:&r When this mode is enabled, multiple functional hatches that could be placed on this multiblock will not be placed, while the unique functional hatch remains unaffected.
eg. When placing on an Electric Blast Furnace with this mode enabled, only the muffler hatch will be placed, not input/output hatches, etc.
&aReplace Mode:&rWhen enabled, using it on an existing multiblock will attempt to replace it with matching Level blocks from the inventory or AE system.
&bUse AE Items:&r As the name suggests, it uses AE items, provided you have a terminal and the terminal is wirelessly connected to your ME container.
&9Mirror Build:&rBuild the multiblock structure mirrored left and right.
&2Module Build:&r Only build the corresponding multi-block's accessory modules

It's recommended to reserve a spot for growing these crops.

Also known as Seed Harvesting Knife

You need to make your first &6Flint Axe&r to chop trees, and a &6Flint Axe&r made without a workbench only has 16 durability.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.45C8A2DF9C0E547: GregTech ores are generated in veins, each vein contains specific ores. &ePress U to check vein generation information&r
&oThe limit of chain mining depends on your tool level, the higher the level, the more blocks you can chain mine, if electrified, you can chain mine more blocks, see the hint section for details.

gto.main-stoneage.quests.514A8AAF7CF7D67: This is an Ad Astra oil well, this structure only generates in the ocean.
If you can't find GregTech's original oil spring, you can extract it from this.
&7&oNote the difference between petroleum and crude oil, you should check EMI&r
gto.main-stoneage.quests.561D79DE960A034: Its recipe is quite different from the original Minecraft, you need 2 &6Flints&r and 2 &6Logs&r.
Of course, you can also check EMI for the crafting recipe, then click the plus sign to automatically synthesize it when you have enough materials.

gto.main-stoneage.quests.67264EF0565CC03: You also need these, it's recommended to mine more.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.6BA5DA36E816380: The coke oven hatch can act as both input and output, it &eWon't&r automatically pull items, but it can &eAutomatically output items and fluids&r from the output hatch.
So to achieve automation, you might need a funnel.
The coke oven hatch shares its contents with the main block.
gto.main-stoneage.quests.6D4B71E543059C1: You need 116 &6Coke Oven Bricks&r to build a minimal usable coke oven.
So you need to craft 116 Compressed &6Coke Clay&r

Then we need to squeeze this pile of stuff in.

Find a way to automate the assembly recipe!
However, the &6Component Assembly Machine Hatch&r is &ctoo expensive&r at this stage. You may consider waiting until reaching the &6HV&r stage to &eimprove productivity&r before crafting it.

gto.mv.quests.0D63E5A54480E693.descripti: Single-block Machine Force Amplifier, equivalent to reducing &eenergy consumption&r for single-block machines while providing &eadditional parallelism and velocity&r.
Extremely expensive, needs thousands of &bAluminium Ingots&r. Bring out all your reserves to treat it!

Some multiblock machines contain &l&6Integral Framework&r&r, which limits the &erecipe Level&r you can run. The actual operating Voltage of the machine will take the minimum of the Voltage provided by the energy hatch and the Integral Framework Voltage.
The Processing Plant is even more &especial&r in that you can only install energy hatches &cexactly&r equal to &6its Integral Framework&r, with no restrictions on power.

However, if you start now, you might only be able to handle an &7LV&r-level Integral Framework. It is recommended to begin mass production after reaching the &6HV&r stage, when you can produce &6Titanium Ingots&r.

gto.mv.quests.1CD5736520A719FA.descripti: You start making more advanced circuit sequences - &eIntegrated Circuit&r
Starting from this sequence, LV circuits no longer require ULV circuits to be synthesized, but are directly synthesized based on etched chips
&r&6Basic Integrated Circuit&r is the earliest form of &eIntegrated Circuit&r

You will discover that each sequence only has three circuits. The highest level circuit is usually just the &ekey&r to unlock the next phase, as it will soon be replaced by the &eequivalent circuit&r of the &eadvanced sequence&r due to its relatively lower cost

gto.mv.quests.5ACCABFAB15E0A59.descripti: As the name suggests, a machine used for crystallization. &6Monocrystalline Silicon&r is a type of single element crystal

When molten silicon solidifies, silicon atoms arrange into a diamond crystal lattice to form a crystal nucleus, the nucleus grows into crystal grains with the same crystal orientation, forming monocrystalline silicon.
This process is generally called &eCrystal Pulling&r
Crystal formation generally requires &6Crystal Seed&r and &6Pure Saturated Solution&r, sometimes also &6Protective Gas&r

gto.steam.quests.017D4D369784454E.descri: To make steel, you need a furnace capable of smelting it. To have a furnace that can withstand high enough temperatures, you need a sufficiently excellent shell material. For that, you'll need a &eForceful machine(?)&r to produce this material.
Obviously, the &6Low Pressure Steam Compressor&r will be more &6Forceful&r than manual compression... right?
Anyway, you need a &6Low Pressure Steam Compressor&r to help you prepare the firebrick, which is necessary for building the &6Primitive Blast Furnace&r.

gto.steam.quests.21D331D7F4F8862C.descri: Here we need to introduce the new mechanism established by GTO: &5Vacuum Level&r
Some recipes require a &5Vacuum Level&r to operate, and the &6Vacuum Tube&r you are about to craft is one of them.
To add &5Vacuum Conditions&r to small machines, the &6Vacuum Pump&r must be &eplaced adjacent&r to the small machine. Correctly run the corresponding &blevel&r Vacuum Pump's &arecipes&r.
Higher vacuum tier conditions can execute lower vacuum tier recipes, but not vice versa&8&m(Obviously)

&r&rBasic vacuum pumps only require &6steam&r to operate, while advanced vacuum pumps need &6electricity&r. The space environment unconditionally provides &5Tier IV Vacuum&r, and multiblock machines are supplied with &5Tier IV Vacuum&r through &6vacuum hatches&r.

gto.steam.quests.298BEC345930429A.descri: &4Ancient World&r generates some ore veins that differ from the &9Overworld&r:
&bBlue Topaz Vein&r(This is your primary source of &bFluorine&r in the early game, and the Chalcocite within it is one of the raw materials for the Platinum processing line)
&dCertus Quartz/Quartz Ore Veins&r(The primary source of quartz, and the core basic material for &4AE&r)
&cTetrahedrite Vein&r(Tetrahedrite is another raw material for platinum processing, and the &6Stibnite&r within it is the core source for producing &6Antimony&r)
&eSulfur Vein&r(A method to obtain large amounts of &eSulfur&r. The &9Sphalerite&r within can be centrifuged to produce &9Gallium Dust&r, which is the &4Unique&r way to obtain it in the early game.)
and some special recipes need to be performed in the Ancient World, such as &aDamascus Steel&r related recipes.

gto.steam.quests.29A2859398D5B252.descri: A type of wire without resistance is collectively called &6Superconducting Wire&r
As long as the current and voltage accepted by the superconducting wire &eis less than&r the &dupper limit of current or voltage&r it can carry, it is absolutely safe.
&8eg. This task guide indicates that the superconducting wire's maximum current capacity is 1A/ULV, so the wire will burn out if it receives 2A/ULV or 1A/LV electricity.&r
&o means you can &a jump &r&6 on &r&e and &r&b off &r the wires

&rOf course, if you let the superconductor wire receive excessive current, it will &4catch fire&r and after a while &4burn out&r. If the current is far beyond the carrying limit, it will &4burn out directly&r.
gto.steam.quests.29A2859398D5B252.title: You can stick wires

&o&eRight-click&r or &[U]&r key main block to view multi-block structure&r

gto.tips.quests.0B472475D703DE42.descrip: When viewing the usage of certain blocks (usually the controller), you will find a special page—&e"Multiblock Info"&r page.
This is specifically used to view the multiblock patterns that this block can build. There are two buttons on its right side: P and ALL.

- &bP&r toggles between different forms of the multiblock, defaulting to Form 0, i.e., &bP: 0&r. Typically, P1 for multiblocks with &evariable length&r is their &6longest form&r, while P1 for multiblocks with &eauxiliary modules&r is their &6auxiliary module&r.
- &bALL&r toggles the display of layers, default state shows all. Click to switch to &bL: X&r to display the structure of the Xth layer.&r

Directly &eclick, drag, zoom in/out&r to view the overall appearance of the multiblock. &eSelect a specific block&r and check in the upper right corner what blocks can be placed in that position, as well as the minimum/maximum number of blocks that can be placed. &cIf your multiblock is not forming but no blocks are missing, prioritize checking the block quantity limits!&r

When you open this page in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r, you will notice an additional &bplus sign&r in the lower right corner, used to encode all blocks of the multiblock into a pattern. Click &bP&r to encode different configurations.
To check what multiblock &6hatches/parallel hatches&r and other hatches can be used for, also view their purposes.

gto.tips.quests.1A44A6A24FF9E7C3.descrip: Let's introduce from top to bottom:
&6Power Hatch&r: Used to control &eturning on/off&r, equivalent to right-clicking with a &6Soft Mallet&r.
&6Minimum Overclocking Time&r: Used to control the &bminimum time&r that a machine's &eoverclocking&r can reach. For specific mechanics, please refer to the overclocking introduction on this page.

&6Batch Processing&r: A new mechanism added by GTO. When enabled, the machine will &cattempt to use&r all materials in the input hatch and multiply the output time &bby&r the number of &erecipes&r executed. The maximum batch processing time is &a3600&r seconds.
&6Update Structure Check&r: GTO does &cnot&r immediately determine &ewhether it is formed&r after multiblock construction for performance reasons. You can click this button to check instantly.
In some machines, there is a button that can be used to &eadjust the machine's Max Parallels&r.

gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.descrip: The principle of the parallel hatch is to allow &emultiple processing&r of multiple raw materials. When crafting large quantities of recipes, the parallel effect means crafting &ax items&r, consuming &ax energy&r, and using &a1 unit&r of time.
On average per recipe, it uses &a1 unit&r of energy and &a1/x units&r of time. This effect is &6equivalent&r to lossless overclocking.

In the interaction between parallel and overclocking, the machine will &eprioritize parallel computation&r. If there is &esurplus power&r after completing parallel computation, it will proceed with overclocking.
gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.subtitl: Mass processing is equivalent to lossless overclocking.
gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.title: Parallel Hatch

After opening your inventory, an additional button appears below your crafting grid. Clicking into it allows you to view your current &enutritional status&r. gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.descrip: Overclocking, the most basic speed-up method. By increasing the input power, machines can achieve faster working speeds. &cOverclocking is unrelated to voltage, only related to power. &rIn the early game, overclocking is divided into &6lossy overclocking&r and &6lossless overclocking&r.

The vast majority of machines use &6Lossy Overclocking&r, which is also the default overclocking mode. For every time the energy hatches installed on the machine can provide more than &a4 times&r the power required by the recipe, the machine's power consumption increases by &a4 times&r, while the processing time is reduced to &a0.5x&r. As seen from the previous formula, the machine pays the price of speeding up by &closing&r one unit of energy.
④I installed 2 &e16A&r&8ULV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e2A&r&bMV&r power, but the machine recipe voltage is only &7LV&r, &ccannot execute recipe&r

You must have noticed a bar in the bottom left corner of the multiblock UI called &e"Adjust the minimum time for machine overclocking"&r, which is designed to protect TPS. Its default value is &a20t&r, which is &a1&r second.

If the recipe's processing time during overclocking falls below this value, another mechanism &e"Compensated Parallelism"&r will take effect. It converts attempts to overclock to &bbelow the minimum time&r into &eparallelism&r, with each overclock converted into &a2x&r additional parallelism. This is why parallelism can be observed on small machines.

&6Lossless Overclocking&r is only supported by specific machines. For every time the energy hatches installed on the machine can provide more than &a4 times&r the power required by the recipe, the machine's power increases by &a4 times&r, while the processing time becomes &a0.25x&r. The machine achieves this speed boost without consuming additional energy.

Overclocking can be triggered &ean infinite number of times&r. If you supply 16 times the power to a lossy overclocking machine, it will perform 2 overclocks (&a4x4&r), and the time taken becomes &a0.25x&r; if you supply 64 times the power, it performs 3 overclocks and the time becomes &a0.125x&r.
&6Single Block Machine&r&cCannot&r normally increase the input amperage (default 1A), but can trigger overclocking by replacing with a &bmore advanced&r single block machine to &eincrease voltage&r.
Assuming I am currently executing a &bMV&r recipe with &6Lossy Overclocking&r
①I installed 2 &e2A&r&bMV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e4A&r&bMV&r power, the machine can perform &a1&r overclock, recipe duration &e0.5x&r;

② I installed 1 &e2A&r&bMV&r energy hatch and 1 &e16A&r&bMV&r energy hatch, so I provided a total of &e18A&r&bMV&r power, but only &e16A&r will be used (because the machine cannot perform the 3rd overclock, requires 64A). The machine can perform &a2&r overclocks, recipe duration &e0.25x&r;

③ I installed 2 &e16A&r&bMV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e32A&r&bMV&r power, but only &e16A&r will be used (because the machine cannot perform the 3rd overclock, which requires 64A). The machine can perform &a2&r overclocks, and the recipe takes &e0.25x&r time.
gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.subtitl: Energy Consumption = Power × Time  Power = Voltage × Current
gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.title: Overclocking!
gto.tips.quests.329F8FA702A2CB5C.descrip: &6Wires/Cables&r are your &eprimary means&r of transmitting electricity in the early game.

&eUntreated&r &6Wires&r have significant &cLine Loss&r (and can electrocute you). The &blonger&r the wire you lay, the &emore&r electricity is lost at the far end. When the wire is &ctoo long&r, the voltage may become &ctoo low&r, causing machines at the far end to not receive enough power to operate.

Applying &eInsulation&r to wires can significantly reduce line loss. However, the most recommended option is always &6Superconductors&r—&eno insulation needed, no leakage, and no risk of electric shock&r.
&o&7Do not let the wire bear more than the rated Voltage and Amperage!
gto.tips.quests.329F8FA702A2CB5C.title: Characteristics of Wires

gto.tips.quests.55CC8C2FD72F7E8B.descrip: &6Overclocking Hatch&r, one of the most proud creations of the &3GregTech Co. Ltd&r R&D Department. It can unconditionally adjust the &etime multiplier&r during each overclocking process.

Taking the &6UHV Overclocking Hatch&r as an example, after installation, each time &eoverclocking&r is performed, the time consumption will be reduced to &a1/3&r of the original. (Here, 3 is the number displayed in the Overclocking Hatch UI.)

Starting from the &6UIV Overclocking Hatch&r, the time multiplier has exceeded &a4&r, which means overclocking not only &esaves time&r but also &esaves energy&r. For the first time, overclocking has a &chigher&r priority than parallel processing.
gto.tips.quests.55CC8C2FD72F7E8B.title: Super Overclocking!!!
gto.tips.quests.567EBE02182A8505.descrip: Move your mouse over the item you want to query the crafting recipe or recipes it can be used in.
Press &4 R &r or &4 Left Mouse Button &r to query the crafting recipe
Press &4 U &r or &4 Right Mouse Button &r to query the recipes it can be used in
(i.e., which items can be crafted with this item)
After opening the interface, there are two rows with arrows at the top
The first row, which is the same as the top icon, can switch crafting tools
(Click the text in this row to view all crafting recipes for this method)
The second row can turn the page
(Many items have a large number of crafting methods, please browse carefully, especially the placement of chambers in multi-block machines)
gto.tips.quests.5C62ECF9AC84E023.descrip: There are several newly added cover plates in GTO, which will be introduced one by one here:
&b       Wireless Transmission Cover&r: Divided into &6Wireless Item Transfer Cover&r and &6Wireless Fluid Cover&r, along with their &dadvanced versions&r;
Feature: Provides an additional 18-slot storage space that can be opened in the GUI for a &csingle&r single-block machine; items are &4non-stackable&r.

Usage: Install on any side of a &esingle-block machine&r, &emultiblock machine controller&r, or &einput hatch&r; control the machine's on/off state by setting &4Redstone signal&r and Normal/Inverted mode&b.

Features: If the installed block also has &eElectric Pump&r, &eConveyor Belt&r, or other logistics hatches, the &6Machine Controller Cover&r can be set to control the &elogistics hatches&r; the &6Machine Controller Cover&r can be activated by strongly/weakly powered blocks.

Usage: Hold an &eOverlay Panel&r in your main hand, crouch and right-click on any container such as a &eSuper Chest&r, &eSuper Tank&r, &eME Interface&r, etc., to bind it. Then attach the &eOverlay Panel&r to the &eoutput port of a single-block machine&r or the &eoutput hatch of a multiblock machine&r to wirelessly transfer items/fluids.
Features: Supports &dCross-Dimensional Transmission&r; Advanced version can install &eFilter Cards&r.

&r         Usage: After building the &6Wireless Charger&r structure, place a &eHV or higher&r level &6Force Field Generator&r in the controller to charge items within the block covered by the &eWireless Charger Cover&r (e.g., charging the &eChainsaw&r in the &eTree Growth Simulator&r);
Features: Can be installed on &eCrates&r and &ePartial&r machine controllers;
&r Usage: Install a &6Programmable Cover&r on a &dsingle-block machine&r to send &evirtual items&r to the machine when distributing pattern items.
Features: Allows &ca single&r single-block machine to run recipes for different circuits or molds/dies.

gto.tips.quests.66A5EC65322E1B8D.descrip: &6Maximum Power&r: The maximum power that the machine can utilize. This value affects the limits of parallel processing and overclocking, meaning it influences &bthe machine's operating speed&r.
&6Maximum Recipe Tier&r: The highest tier of recipes the machine can execute, which affects &bwhether the machine can execute recipes&r.
&eMaximum recipe level (or machine recipe level) and maximum power are two different things—don't confuse them!&r

gto.tips.quests.6A32CEF6BE50FA89.descrip: If the controller can be rotated, use a &6Wrench&r to &eright-click&r the controller to &6rotate&r it, then use the Terminal on it to build the rotated multiblock.
When dealing with oversized multiblocks, you can rotate the controller by &a90 degrees&r to make the multiblock &estand vertically on the ground&r (such as the Assembly Line).
It can also &emirror form&r, simply use the &6Advanced Terminal&r to open mirror mode and build.

gto.tips.quests.71DC44EE0771E731.descrip: &aDual Hatch Overclocking&r: Installing at least &atwo&r&6energy hatches of the same tier&r (current does not need to be the same) on a multiblock machine triggers &6overclocking&r, allowing the machine to execute recipes at &bone voltage tier higher&r.

Note that the machine's UI displays two voltages: the &6Maximum Power&r voltage is related to &eOverclocking Count&r, while the &6Maximum Recipe Tier&r indicates the &eRecipe Voltage&r that the machine can handle.

&o&7Boosting does not change the power provided by the energy hatch, it only increases the voltage and reduces the amperage. The reason boosting is always achievable is that even the energy hatch with the lowest amperage can provide at least 2A to the machines, so after dual-hatch boosting, it can definitely provide at least 1A of amperage.

gto.uv.quests.0AD0174C98673F5B.descripti: In subsequent megastructures, you can use these four efficiency hatches to improve machine performance:
&aParallel Hatch&r: Can be used with parallel machines. Allows the machine to process multiple recipes at double the power at once, effectively providing lossless overclocking in a sense.

&aOverclocking Hatch&r: Can be used by some machines. &bUnconditionally&r speeds up machine operations. The number indicates that when the hatch level is &bhigher than&r the recipe level, the recipe time will be multiplied by this percentage. For each level the hatch is &blower than&r the recipe, the speed-up effect is reduced by 20 percentage points.
&aThreading Hatch&r: Only cross-recipe parallel machines can use. Allows machines to run multiple &bdifferent recipes&r simultaneously to maximize parallelism and highest efficiency.

&aOverclocking Hatch&r: Almost exclusively usable by megastructures. Extremely powerful, it can directly &bmodify the machine's overclocking time multiplier coefficient&r. The UV level provides standard lossy overclocking, the UEV level achieves lossless overclocking, and the higher UXV level can reach 4x power and 6x speed, meaning the more the machine is overclocked, the more power-efficient it becomes!
Additionally, the Configurable Maintenance Hatch can also provide a slight machine acceleration effect.
